main event: A bright metallic silver oblong-shaped object, 25 feet long, was observed in Roscow, NY on 3 Jan 58 for 20 seconds. It followed a straight flight path and progressed out of vision.
interesting points: The object was 25 feet long and described as bright metallic silver.
The observation lasted for 20 seconds before the object progressed out of vision.
The report concluded that the object was probably an aircraft based on its description, duration, and flight path.
The sighting took place at different altitudes, ranging from 6,000 ft to 55,000 ft.
The observation was made by a civilian and reported to the Air Force.
sighted object: bright metallic silver oblong-shaped object, 25 feet long
